summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; approving a Memorandum of Understanding dated May 25, 1994, between The City of Seattle and Seattle Police Management Association; abrogating the position of Vice and Narcotics Major; providing a salary adjustment effective July 1, 1994, to certain employees of the Police Department; advancing the rank of the commander of the Training Section of the Police Department from Lieutenant to Captain; and providing payment therefor.
